overview: Agil (Tora Sudiro), a taxi driver, and his wife Luli (Alexandra Gottardo), a salon employee. live in a mediocre state. They are bussy looking for income. It makes them difficult to get a baby. Then Agil makes a wish: if his wife is pregnant then he will fulfill all requests of his wife. His prayer is answered. Luli is pregnant. Instead of being happy, Agil actually is confused. One morning he finds a brochure of a red Yaris car under the pillow of his wife's bed. He asks his wife if she really wants a red Yaris. Luli says yes. His efforts to fulfill the wishes of his wife failed continuously, and he falls into a failed robbery.
title: Mangga Muda
